description.full: Rocksmith™ is the 1st and only game that lets you play with any real electric or bass guitar to learn while you play. Nothing plastic, nothing fake, just the most authentic and complete guitar experience in music gaming. By plugging into your console, you’ll develop real skills and real styles while playing real music.  Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB.
